import React from 'react'; import './Problem.css'; const Problem = () => { return (
{/* Desktop */}

Problem

The original personal account was just a basic order page, lacking features like order tracking, payment management, and service exploration. Users frequently contacted support for help with linking payment methods, and there were no upsell or partner promotion opportunities.

{/* Tablet */}

Problem

The original personal account was just a basic order page, lacking features like order tracking, payment management, and service exploration. Users frequently contacted support for help with linking payment methods, and there were no upsell or partner promotion opportunities.

{/* Mobile */}

Problem

The original personal account was just a basic order page, lacking features like order tracking, payment management, and service exploration. Users frequently contacted support for help with linking payment methods, and there were no upsell or partner promotion opportunities.

); }; export default Problem;
